paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with hereditary ATTR cardiomyopathy by cardiac biopsy and genetic testing
individual_records.evidence_sentence: As genetic testing confirmed Val30Met mutation, she was diagnosed with late-onset hereditary ATTR with cardiomyopathy and polyneuropathy.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with hereditary ATTR cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: The patient's younger brother was recently diagnosed with hereditary amyloid transthyretin (ATTR).
variants.additional_notes: The variant is known to cause significant clinical manifestations in carriers.
key_quotes: As genetic testing confirmed Val30Met mutation, she was diagnosed with late-onset hereditary ATTR with cardiomyopathy and polyneuropathy.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the text.
